name: Mortar Howl
description:
Mortar Howl - the game in which you have to take control of the mortar, and destroy enemy Rocket Launcher
At a certain interval, the enemy will also attack you.
To win, you need to destroy all the Rocket Launcher before they do it with you

How to play:
- Aim at the enemy mortar
- Loading mines into the mortar
- We are waiting for the mine to hit the target

Features:
- 20 different levels
- Unusual gameplay
- Beautiful low poly graphics
- Realistic Physics
